page.title: 19TOURISM
page.content: {HOLIDAY MAKERS.}The area is popular for holidays, these being mainly taken in caravans along the coast.The holidaymakers come from the City of Kingston upon Hull and the inland West Riding towns and cities of Yorkshire.There are no amenities in our study area but there are extensive beaches by the North Sea and amusements and bingo halls in nearby Withernsea. {MIGRATIONS.}Some holiday makers buy small houses and cottages as second homes and there are some of these in our study area.Some unemployed people have sold their houses inland and have moved here permanently.(See : Migrations next page).
